sourceMeaningMnemonic: There <radical>go</radical> some <radical>angel</radical>s with <radical>drop</radical>s on their shoulders. Carrying drops like that requires <kanji>technique</kanji>. It’s a real <kanji>art</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Angels are really good at going around carrying drops! Imagine the artistry and technique involved. I bet they do some kind of dance, and there's lots of sparkly magic.
readingMnemonic: Angels are so good at this because they are trained in nin<reading>jutsu</reading> (<ja>じゅつ</ja>), or the "ninja techniques." Everyone knows that ninjas are great at carrying drops on the go!
readingInfo: Imagine an angel trained in ninjutsu. Marvel at all their divine ninja techniques!
